data.actual_result: The M just gets cut (If the channel is anything longer than 17 characters, it will have the dots).
data.expected_result: There should be dots in the voice channel name.
data.short_description: The voice channel name gets cut with 17 characters and a user limit at 10.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Voice Channel with the name having 17 characters, and the voice chat limit being 10 users (I used "Pew Pew Game Room). - Observe the last letter getting cut (For me, M).
